description: Get alerts from TfL about major travel disruptions through Twitter direct message notifications

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Find out how to get alerts about major disruptions on your line through Twitter direct messages and how to check the status of your line."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

We have created a system to provide alerts about major disruptions through Twitter direct messages. The service is free and uses our data to inform you when there are significant delays or an alternative route is required. Within a direct message, you can also instantly check the status of your line.
Travel alerts and a status checker are available for all Tube lines, DLR, London Overground and TfL Rail.
To receive these alerts, you will need to enable notifications on your phone .
On Twitter, open a direct message with one of our accounts and select 'Subscribe or edit alerts'. Your subscriptions can be personalised with the following options:
